refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the number of a named instrument.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the number of a named instrument.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: insno -- the instrument number of the named instrument.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: If an instrument with the specified name does not exist, an init error occurs, and -1 is returned.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the nstrnum opcode. It uses the file nstrnum_nstrstr.csd.
Example of the nstrnum opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
A musical examples featuring the nstrnum opcode: TivalNstrnum_Yi.csd by Steven Yi.

The example will produce the following output:
instrument name = john instrument number = 2
